title: kAruNya guruparanE mA (sj)
sahitya:
kAruNya guruparanE mA karuNaiyAi irangi enadu pAvam parihari


1:  neri tavir manuDanin bhavamara guruciDam uyir taru mariyena surarnidam tudi puri
 caraNam 2    kAraNakartA kAruNyam vaippAi kAsini bhavamara varu sarvEshA 
pUraNa shuddhAbhUtala vittA pOTri un tiruvaDi sharaNa aDaindEnE
kAru mA dayA parAparan unadu mA karuNaiyAl irangi aruL puri
 caraNam 3    pakSamuDan pAvigaTku panniya pArttu miga AvalAlE pAvam nInga pAdam varum
pAvi pAva bhAram nInga pAril sumai tAngi ena pErum koNDu Arum kUvi ninru uyir taru
 caraNam 4    prapancattAn puri vanjattAl bhuvi unaip-pugaliDam enap-pugundEnE
tiru kanjattAL tanil vandittEn dayavuDan uyir pera tiruvaruL tA tA
maNa migu malaroDu maruvoDu magizh migu manadoDu nidam abhirAm unai tudittiDa
